name: Microsoft Mathematics Worksheet
summary: Learn about .GCW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Microsoft Mathematics 4.0 was released in January 2011. Earlier versions of the software were named Microsoft Math.

description: A GCW file is a math worksheet created with Microsoft Mathematics, an educational calculator program. It may include equations, graphs, and handwritten calculus expressions created using the Ink tool.
